DAILY_BONUS_DESC.en: Click on a snowflake for a reward!

CODE_WRONG.en:
The code is wrong
Please try again

CODE_USED.en:
The code has already 
been redeemed

PAUSE_EXIT.en:
Are you sure you want to 
return to the main menu?

PAUSE_RESTART.en:
Are you sure you want to 
restart the level?

HELP_MAIN_0.en:
Play story mode and collect crystals to unlock 
the Northern Lights

HELP_MAIN_1.en: Play endless mode to see how far you can get.

HELP_MAIN_2.en: Get a hi-score and try to beat it each time you play.

HELP_GOALS_0.en:
Check your progress on goals. Finishing goals earns 
you extra snowflakes.

HELP_CHARACTER_0.en: Select a character to play with

HELP_CHARACTER_1.en:
Upgrade your character to make them 
faster and stronger

HELP_CHARACTER_2.en:
Tumble Speed will help you to spin faster in-air 
when tumbling

HELP_CHARACTER_3.en: Snow Magnet will help you to attract more snowflakes

HELP_CHARACTER_4.en: Troll Magic will help you to stay invincible longer

HELP_CHARACTER_5.en: Each character can collect crystals of a specific colour.

HELP_CHARACTER_6.en:
Each character has a different ability. 
Be sure to try them all out!

HELP_CHARACTER_7.en:
Collecting all the crystals in all the levels will restore 
the Northern Lights (and unlock a bonus character).

HELP_MAP_0.en: This map will show you the way to the Trolls Valley.

HELP_MAP_1.en:
Unlock additional characters as you progress 
through the levels.

HELP_MAP_2.en: Travel to the Trolls Valley (by finishing all the story levels) to find Grand Pabbie.

HELP_GENERIC_0_MOB.en: Tap on the right to jump

HELP_GENERIC_1_PC.en: Left click and hold to tumble.

HELP_GENERIC_1_MOB.en: Tap and hold to perform a tumble

HELP_GENERIC_2_MOB.en: Tap on the left of the screen to perform character's special ability

HELP_GENERIC_3.en: Use Sven or a sleigh to travel faster and more safely.

HELP_GENERIC_4.en: Marshmallow will protect you from snow balls.

HELP_STORY_0.en: Collect crystals through out the level.

HELP_CHARACTER_ANNA_0.en:
Anna can double-jump to allow her to reach special places 
that nobody else can.

HELP_CHARACTER_KRISTOFF_0.en: Kristoff can break through ice blocks using his trusty ice axe.

HELP_CHARACTER_OLAF_0.en:
Olaf can roll along the floor to get into tight spaces 
that nobody else can access.

HELP_CHARACTER_ELSA_0.en: Elsa can use bursts of ice magic to create bridges in the air.

HELP_CHARACTER_PABBIE_0.en:
Grand Pabbie can break throught all the obstacles in the game!
He's also the fastest tumbler.

HELP_ENDLESS_0.en: This shows how far you have travelled.

HELP_ENDLESS_1.en: This will show you your personal best.

QUIT.en: Are you sure you want to quit?

ENDLESS_LOCKED.en:
Please finish {value} levels 
of Story to unlock 
Endless Mode.

ENDLESS_UNLOCKED.en:
Endless Mode Unlocked!
Get a hi-score and try 
to beat it each time you play!

ENDGAME_LEVELS.en:
You've found Grand Pabbie!
Help find the remaining crystals to unlock him and fully restore the Northern Lights.

ENDGAME_CRYSTALS.en:
Congratulations!
You've restored the Northern Lights!
Help Grand Pabbie find the trolls scattered through the levels!

ENDGAME_TROLLS.en:
Congratulations!
You found all of the trolls!
Now everybody can enjoy the Northern Lights!

TUTORIAL_TUMBLE.en:
Hold down jump to tumble 
and earn style points

TUTORIAL_SNOWFLAKE.en:
Collecting snowflakes increases your 
score and allows you to buy upgrades.

TUTORIAL_TROLL.en: The trolls will help you find crystals

TUTORIAL_ABILITY.en:
Use your special ability 
to collect crystals

TUTORIAL_MAGIC.en:
Troll Magic will make you invincible 
for a few seconds

INTRO_1.en: These crystals have lost their glow.

INTRO_2.en: Without them the Northern Lights are fading!

INTRO_4.en:
We will help you find new crystals 
to bring back the Northern Lights.

OUTRO_0.en: Thank you for collecting all of the crystals.

EXIT_DISNEY.en: Are you sure you want to leave Frozen Rush?

EXIT_NOT_DISNEY.en: Are you sure you want to leave Disney?

EXIT_NOT_DISNEY_DESCRIPTION.en: Disney does not control the website you are going to so please make sure you are happy to continue. Disney's privacy practices and controls do not apply once you leave our site. If you are a child reading this, please get your parent or guardian's permission to continue.

jump_run.en: Land {value} jumps in a single run

tumble_run.en: Land {value} tumble-jumps in a single run

marshmallow.en: Get Marshmallow to help you {value} time

marshmallow_plural.en: Get Marshmallow to help you {value} times

coins_run.en: Collect {value} snowflakes in a single run

description.en:
Anna can double-jump 
to allow her to reach 
special places that 
nobody else can.

Kristoff can break 
through ice blocks using 
his trusty ice axe.

Olaf can roll along 
the floor to get into 
tight spaces that nobody 
else can access.

Elsa can use bursts 
of ice magic to create 
bridges in the air.

Grand Pabbie can 
break throught any obstacle 
in the game! He's 
also the fastest tumbler.
